name: Nesert Golfing: Tournament Edition
overview:
NESert Golfing is an NES game heavily inspired by Desert Golfing.

Can be played with the SNES Mouse, if you know how to connect one to an NES. Otherwise the regular controllers work too, and for the party animals who don't like to share a controller 4-player adapters are supported as well. Famicom works too.

For 1 to 4 players

This alternate version is intended for those who want to compete at separate consoles, or otherwise be able to repeat the same set of holes. Instead of randomly generating them, the Tournament Edition allows you to choose a seed value to play a specific course.
